    • Constructor Detail

      • Chip

        public Chip(java.awt.Point[] validMoveSet,
            java.awt.Point[] extendedMoveSet,
            Player owner,
            char type)
        Chip Constructor stores its own valid movesets and it owner
        Parameters:
        validMoveSet - An array of all poosible standard valid move offsets calculated from the chips origin
        extendedMoveSet - An array of all poosible extended valid move offsets calculated from the chips origin. Used for special circumstance moves (i.e. Checkers: chip jumps chip)
        owner - Player object which controlls this Chip
        type - chip type (char value)

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        public Player getOwner()
        Returns the owner of Chip object
        Returns:
        Player object that owns this Chip

      • getType

        public char getType()
        Returns the piece type of the Chip
        Returns:
        returns the type of Chip

      • getNumMoves

        public int getNumMoves()
        Returns the number of moves this piece can possibly perform.
        Returns:
        the number of different moves the piece can possibly make

      • getMoveSets

        public java.awt.Point[] getMoveSets()
        Returns a list of all moves the piece can make
        Returns:
        the list of all possible moves of the chip

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(java.awt.Point offset,
                           boolean ext)
        Determines if the provided offset is included in the chips valid movesets.
        Parameters:
        offset - The 'to' location or distance from point of origin
        ext - true to evaluate EXTENDED_MOVE_SET, false to evaluate VALID_MOVE_SET.
        Returns:
        true if the move destination is included in the chip objects valid moveset
